text: Chill King is expert at "going with the flow" and "taking it easy", has calming aura of the true Dude, which really pisses of chaos warriors for some reason.
Only the one true king can draw Excalibur, so why not use it as immovable object.
This armor is created from Eternal Ice. It holds as impregnable castle and can protect dragon King from mightiest of blows.
If you throw it with enough force perhaps even walls will break.
Legendary blade of ice and steel. How can dragon use it? That is a good question and I bet there is good answer to it.
This is our land, we will drive any enemy away.
Personal supervision of expenses can save surprisingly a lot.
Quality gear maintenance for defensive forces is always important.
Crusaders heart is never at rest when enemy is out there and enemy is always out there.
Supply lines are important for any distant campaign. Now everything is in crusading distance.
Now everyone in kingdom likes crusades, even peasants back home like our little "escapades".
